title: How can I add money into BMS Cash? : BookMyShow Support Centre
body: Solution home FAQ's BMS Cash How can I add money into BMS Cash? Print Modified on: Wed, 20 May, 2020 at 12:01 PM Unfortunately, you'd be unable to directly add money to BMS Cash. However, you can accumulate BMS Cash if there is a ' User Cancellation ' initiated. Did you find it helpful? Yes No Send feedback Sorry we couldn't be helpful. Help us improve this article with your feedback.
